html
Class Link

java.lang.Object
  html.Link

public class Link
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides an object based approach when creating an html based link. For more information view the various constructors in this class.

Author:
ICT09

_TARGET_BLANK

public static final Type _TARGET_BLANK
Constructor Detail

Link

public Link(java.lang.String url,
            java.lang.String label,
            java.lang.String alt)
Creates a Html link object

Parameters:
url - the url this link refers to
label - the label of this link, this is the thing you click on when viewing a page
alt - The alt text for this link, this is the tooltip you get when hovering over the link

Link

public Link(java.lang.String url,
            java.lang.String label,
            java.lang.String alt,
            Type target)
Creates a Html link object

Parameters:
url - the url this link refers to
label - the label of this link, this is the thing you click on when viewing a page
alt - The alt text for this link, this is the tooltip you get when hovering over the link
target - the target window to open the url in. You can get valid targets using Link._TARGET_BLANK or other similar fields in this class.
